analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/37/0x8170fdafa281530ab8353de4d29a3f45949ee50c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_chucks/37/0x8170fdafa281530ab8353de4d29a3f45949ee50c.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/37/0x8170fdafa281530ab8353de4d29a3f45949ee50c.sol#35-36) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_disabled' of Flame.disablePresale (/unique_chucks/37/0x8170fdafa281530ab8353de4d29a3f45949ee50c.sol#130) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_address' of Flame.transferFunds (/unique_chucks/37/0x8170fdafa281530ab8353de4d29a3f45949ee50c.sol) is not in mixedCase
